resources.string: This is such an interesting scrapbook
Wow. I could not agree more! Definitely going to follow this user after seeing this!
This reminds me of my travels back in the day. Nostalgia!
I was thinking the same thing. Need to save up so I can visit here again
You should definitely keep posting, these are amazing. Do you know when your next trip will be and where you\'ll be going next?
I heard that this place was beautiful but I didn\'t believe it until now...
